name: Iris (Jarryd Worland)
description:
Destroy enemy space shapes with the power of friendship and colour theory! Iris is a 2D, co-operative scrolling shooter. Fly through two levels of colour chaos as you swap your ship's colours as needed to fight various space shapes. Combine with your ally to make new colours and take on more challenging enemies, making your way to the final boss...

Swinburne University of Technology - Capstone Project created by Elemental Twist
